price: 71. Il dit : « Voici mes filles, si vous devez (absolument) faire (ce que vous avez l’intention de faire) ! »
arabic: قَالَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِيٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla hāulāi banātī in kuntum fāʿilīna
